com.skobbler.ngx.map
Class SKAnnotationText

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKAnnotationText

public class SKAnnotationText
extends java.lang.Object

Class that specifies the text (as well as the text attributes) that can be rendered with an annotation.

Version:
2.3
